name: react-native-voise
description: react-native-voise provide voice recognition service to app,the voice recognition service come from [baidu voise](http://yuyin.baidu.com/ "Baidu Voise")  ###Regist baidu voise account Go to [Baidu Voise](http://yuyin.baidu.com/ "Baidu Voise"),Regist account for voise service ,and create a app ,then get App ID、 API Key、Secret Key.  ### Installation
author: hongyin163
